product_overview: A high-performance, SEO-optimized personal portfolio built with Astro and Supabase to showcase projects, skills, education, and experience with a secure admin dashboard for dynamic content management.
core_goals: Showcase professional portfolio to recruiters and clients with clear, compelling presentation of skills and projects
Maintain top-tier web performance and accessibility (Lighthouse scores 90+)
Provide a secure, user-friendly Admin Dashboard for CRUD management of portfolio content
Ensure responsive, cross-device compatibility and strong SEO to increase discoverability
Enable easy content updates via Supabase integration without code changes
key_features: Responsive Header Navigation with logo and mobile menu toggle
Hero Section with particle background, typewriter effect, social links and CTA
About section with profile, bio, and resume download
Skills showcase with categorized skill cards and proficiency indicators
Education and Experience timelines with structured entries
Projects Portfolio with filtering, cards, thumbnails, demo and source links
Contact Form integrated with email/backend API and input validation
Admin Dashboard with authentication (Supabase Auth) and full CRUD for Projects, Skills, Education, Experience
Image upload/asset management for project thumbnails in admin
SEO optimization: dynamic meta tags, OpenGraph, Twitter Cards, Schema.org JSON-LD
PWA support (service worker and manifest) for offline/installable behavior
Animations and UI effects: particles.js, tilt, typed, scroll reveal
Supabase integration for dynamic data storage and retrieval
user_flow_summary: Visitor lands on Home → views Hero (typing effect) → clicks CTA to About → scrolls to Skills/Projects/Experience → clicks Project card to view details or external demo/repo → uses Contact form to message the owner
Visitor navigates to /projects → uses category filters → opens a project detail or follows live/source link
Visitor navigates to /experience → reads detailed timeline entries and role descriptions

Admin visits /admin → redirected to login if unauthenticated → authenticates via Supabase Auth → views dashboard overview → navigates to Projects/Skills/Education/Experience → uses Create/Edit/Delete workflows with image uploads → saves changes which persist to Supabase and reflect on public site
Form submission flow: Visitor fills Contact form → client-side validation → POST to backend/email integration → displays success/failure toast → stores message (optional) in Supabase
validation_criteria: Performance: Lighthouse score ≥90 for Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO on core pages (Home, Projects, Experience)
Responsiveness: Layouts render correctly at common breakpoints (320px, 375px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px) and pass visual regression tests
Accessibility: All pages pass automated a11y scans (axe-core) and manual keyboard/ARIA checks; images have alt text; forms are reachable and operable by keyboard
SEO: Correct title/description and OpenGraph tags per page; valid JSON-LD Schema; sitemap and robots.txt present
Authentication & Security: Admin routes require Supabase session; environment variables used for secrets; input sanitized and validated on both client and server
Data integrity: CRUD operations persist immediately to Supabase and reflect on public pages; image uploads store reachable URLs
Contact form: sends email successfully in test environment and shows appropriate UX feedback on success/failure
PWA: site registers service worker; manifest present; site passes installability checklist
Unit & E2E Tests: Core data functions (supabase lib) covered by unit tests; critical flows (admin CRUD, contact form submission, project filtering) covered by E2E tests
Error handling: 404 page shown for unknown routes; proper notifications for server failures; logs captured for admin actions
